20110120131102.000|20110120131104.000|TR0|DNA samples and they were a match.  Of 
20110120131104.000|20110120131107.000|TR0|course, the big question, guys, is: who 
20110120131107.000|20110120131109.000|TR0|kidnapped Carlina White all of those years 
20110120131109.000|20110120131112.000|TR0|ago?  Authorities are remaining
